Fulfillment with Non-Negotiable Criteria.description:
- While the candidate demonstrates strong REST API design, relational database proficiency, Git usage, and agile practices, there is zero evidence of Java development or Spring Boot experience.  
   - Core requirements around Java fundamentals (OOP, collections, exceptions, multithreading) and build tools like Maven/Gradle are entirely missing.

Fulfillment with Negotiable Criteria.description:
- The resume shows solid AWS exposure and RESTful service architecture, plus AI/ML coursework—aligning with cloud services and potential AI/ML integrations.  
   - However, there’s no mention of Docker containerization or messaging queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ), and microservices experience is implied but not explicit.

Continuity and Recency of Experience.description:
- The candidate has maintained continuous software engineering roles since 2011, showing commitment and growth in full-stack development and cloud architecture.  
   - Yet none of that recent experience involves Java or Spring ecosystems, making the recency of applicable skills to this role very low.
